item.title: Glitch out!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: This week started with the release of Stolen Mech's "Sundog for Basstard", whose style is a first here on Redvolume. Glitch with a touch of IDM. One second you're embraced by chilled out breaks and in the next, glitchy wobbles from all sides together with oozing synths. Stream it from Spotify, or buy from any of the stores to the left, e.g. Beatport.
item.content:encoded: This week started with the release of Stolen Mech's "Sundog for Basstard", which style is a first here on Redvolume. Glitch with a touch of IDM. One second you're embraced by chilled out breaks and in the next, glitchy wobbles from all sides together with oozing synths. Stream it from Spotify, or buy from any of the stores to the left, e.g. Beatport.

item.title: That Berlin feeling
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: If you haven't heard Subject Lost's first release on Redvolume yet, it just got online on Spotify today, along with our three previous releases. Sorry for the delay! The sound can best be described as "L-Wiz meets Berlin" from our point of view, and we hope you will love it as much as we do. Check it out on Spotify, or buy the 320s and WAV's over at Beatport.
item.content:encoded: If you haven't heard Subject Lost's first release on Redvolume yet, it just got online on Spotify today, along with our three previous releases. Sorry for the delay! The sound can best be described as "L-Wiz meets Berlin" from our point of view, and we hope you will love it as much as we do. Check it out on Spotify, or buy the 320s and WAV's over at Beatport.

item.title: L-Wiz Gold
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Congratulations to L-Wiz winning the Swedish national radio's P3 Guld prize tonight! The prize is a celebration of Swedish music and was awarded in Gothenburg. Among the other nominees were Avicii, Axel Boman, Jonsson/Alter and Rebecca & Fiona. This is a huge moment for Swedish dubstep! Back to the party…
item.content:encoded: Congratulations to L-Wiz winning the Swedish national radio's P3 Guld prize tonight! The prize is a celebration of Swedish music and was awarded in Gothenburg. Among the other nominees were Avicii, Axel Boman, Jonsson/Alter and Rebecca & Fiona. This is a huge moment for Swedish dubstep! Back to the party…

item.title: On Spotify
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Distributor ST Holdings has withdrawn 234 labels from Spotify, removing a big chunk of dubstep from the streaming music service. It's a sad decision for all dubstep fans out there, and Redvolume promise to always keep it's music on there, which is available in this playlist.
item.content:encoded: Distributor ST Holdings has withdrawn 234 labels from Spotify, removing a big chunk of dubstep from the streaming music service. It's a sad decision for all dubstep fans out there, and Redvolume promise to always keep it's music on there, which is available in this playlist.

item.title: Steve Jobs 1955-2011
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Thank you Steve for all you've done! Redvolume might not have existed today if it wasn't for you. In sorrow, our iPhone app will be a free download for the rest of the year.
item.content:encoded: Thank you Steve for all you've done! Redvolume might not have existed today if it wasn't for you. In sorrow, our iPhone app will be a free download for the rest of the year.

item.title: Open the cosmic casket
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Hailing from Russia, the dubstep debut of Vincent Nine has just been released, which brings along a fresh, progressive and deeply needed melodic sound! Uplifting and colourful, this should spice up any dance floor.
Available from: Beatport, Juno, Digital-Tunes, Boomkat and Spotify.
item.content:encoded:
Hailing from Russia, the dubstep debut of Vincent Nine has just been released, which brings along a fresh, progressive and deeply needed melodic sound! Uplifting and colourful, this should spice up any dance floor.

Available from: Beatport, Juno, Digital-Tunes, Boomkat and Spotify.

item.title: RIP Captain Beefheart
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Don Van Vliet aka Captain Beefheart passed away yesterday. In his honour, Susheela Raman's remixed cover of his "Love Lies" from RVOL003 can be downloaded free from here.
item.content:encoded: Don Van Vliet aka Captain Beefheart passed away yesterday. In his honour, Susheela Raman's remixed cover of his "Love Lies" from RVOL003 can be downloaded free from here.

item.title: In the background
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: The Redvolume iPhone app was updated to version 1.5 today. Now featuring a total of 55 high quality tracks, with full multitasking support for background audio, and continuous playlist mode. Get it today for only 0.99$!
item.content:encoded: The Redvolume iPhone app was updated to version 1.5 today. Now featuring a total of 55 high quality tracks, with full multitasking support for background audio, and continuous playlist mode. Get it today for only 0.99$!

item.title: Actraiser EP out now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Call it Burial-esque, call it future garage. Actraiser's new EP represents a deep and emotive sound based around the futuristic combination of garage and jungle music. If you're in for big subs, growling reeces, 2-step beats and next level percussion, Actraiser could very well be your next hero.
Losing You EP is available today from Beatport, Juno and Boomkat.
item.content:encoded:
Call it Burial-esque, call it future garage. Actraiser's new EP represents a deep and emotive sound based around the futuristic combination of garage and jungle music. If you're in for big subs, growling reeces, 2-step beats and next level percussion, Actraiser could very well be your next hero.

Losing You EP is available today from Beatport, Juno and Boomkat.

item.title: Ninety Eight LP
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
In these times of brostep and people missing the good old days of dubstep, The Faun went even further, all the way back to '98 to find inspiration for his new album, just out today! Available from Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes.
The album will soon also be on Spotify, and in the updated version 1.4 of the Redvolume iPhone app. Hope you will like it as much as we do!
item.content:encoded:
In these times of brostep and people missing the good old days of dubstep, The Faun went even further, all the way back to '98 to find inspiration for his new album, just out today! Available from Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes.

The album will soon also be on Spotify, and in the updated version 1.4 of the Redvolume iPhone app. Hope you will like it as much as we do!

item.title: Titan all over!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Redemption & The Faun's "Titan" has just been let loose! The release, which includes a gorgeous remix by Pacheko, is available as a digital exclusive from Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes, but also on the Lordz of Dubstep Vol 2 CD compilation along with a couple of other Redvolume tracks (more details here). Last but not least, it's of course included in our iPhone app.
item.content:encoded: Redemption & The Faun's "Titan" has just been let loose! The release, which includes a gorgeous remix by Pacheko, is available as a digital exclusive from Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes, but also on the Lordz of Dubstep Vol 2 CD compilation along with a couple of other Redvolume tracks (more details here). Last but not least, it's of course included in our iPhone app.

item.title: iPhone app available now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Redvolume Records is very proud to present it's own iPhone app! Available now from the iTunes App Store, the app includes our complete discography (43 tracks) in high quality, and the latest info on all artists. Check iTunes or the Releases section for a full list of features.
item.content:encoded: Redvolume Records is very proud to present it's own iPhone app! Available now from the iTunes App Store, the app includes our complete discography (43 tracks) in high quality, and the latest info on all artists. Check iTunes or the Releases section for a full list of features.

item.title: The Faun mashing it up!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
The Faun rounds off this year with yet another three tracker, available now as a digital exclusive! His Mashup EP is dark, melodic and techy with a spice of funky skank, just as you've come to know him.
Buy it from: Beatport, Juno, Digital-Tunes and Boomkat, or stream it from Spotify.
item.content:encoded:
The Faun rounds off this year with yet another three tracker, available now as a digital exclusive! His Mashup EP is dark, melodic and techy with a spice of funky skank, just as you've come to know him.

Buy it from: Beatport, Juno, Digital-Tunes and Boomkat, or stream it from Spotify.

item.title: Changes available now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Germany based Twisted is back with the deepness once again, in the fifth installment of our exclusive digital series. Pulsating pads and bouncy rhythms, where the b-side is remixed by his countryman TKR. Pure bass therapy.
Buy it from: Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes.
item.content:encoded:
Germany based Twisted is back with the deepness once again, in the fifth installment of our exclusive digital series. Pulsating pads and bouncy rhythms, where the b-side is remixed by his countryman TKR. Pure bass therapy.

Buy it from: Beatport, Juno and Digital-Tunes.

item.title: JSL single out now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
JSL, formerly known as RUF, is back on Redvolume with, in our opinion, his best tracks yet! E500 AMG is a nice blissed out track with plenty of pads and mellow ravey flavors. The title as per usual hinting at JSL's great love of cars. Evolution II is a solid wobbler, featuring teeth-grinding bass and a superb distant reverb sound.
Buy it from: Juno, Chemical, Redeye and BM Soho among others. Digital: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Spotify.
item.content:encoded:
JSL, formerly known as RUF, is back on Redvolume with, in our opinion, his best tracks yet! E500 AMG is a nice blissed out track with plenty of pads and mellow ravey flavors. The title as per usual hinting at JSL's great love of cars. Evolution II is a solid wobbler, featuring teeth-grinding bass and a superb distant reverb sound.

Buy it from: Juno, Chemical, Redeye and BM Soho among others.
Digital: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Spotify.

item.title: Two New Digital Exclusives
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
As of today, two new releases in the Digital Exclusive series is out! First off is a double A-side single by Twisted, featuring his deepest productions yet! Buy it from: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Boomkat.
We also have a new split single, featuring dark and distorted machine skank by Finnish duo Vesicle, along with a pitch black, old-school, half-step roller by Tyrant & Caustik. Buy it from: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Boomkat
Both coming to Spotify soon, along with an exclusive pre-release of JSL's forthcoming 12" vinyl, out this summer.
item.content:encoded:
As of today, two new releases in the Digital Exclusive series is out! First off is a double A-side single by Twisted, featuring his deepest productions yet!
Buy it from: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Boomkat.

We also have a new split single, featuring dark and distorted machine skank by Finnish duo Vesicle, along with a pitch black, old-school, half-step roller by Tyrant & Caustik.
Buy it from: Beatport, Digital-Tunes, Juno and Boomkat

Both coming to Spotify soon, along with an exclusive pre-release of JSL's forthcoming 12" vinyl, out this summer.

item.title: L-Wiz - First Step EP out now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
After 3 previous split singles, it's finally time for their first solo EP on Redvolume. No matter if you're looking for merciless synth wobble to get the dance floor cooking, or the more melodic trademark L-Wiz sound, this EP's got it. Out now on 12" vinyl and all digital formats.
View the tracklist and find out where to buy.
item.content:encoded:
After 3 previous split singles, it's finally time for their first solo EP on Redvolume. No matter if you're looking for merciless synth wobble to get the dance floor cooking, or the more melodic trademark L-Wiz sound, this EP's got it. Out now on 12" vinyl and all digital formats.

View the tracklist and find out where to buy.

item.title: Spotify = Spotify + Redvolume
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description: Most of the Redvolume catalogue is now available to enjoy on Spotify. Use this playlist to reach everything that's up so far. The rest will be added in the near future. Stay tuned!
item.content:encoded: Most of the Redvolume catalogue is now available to enjoy on Spotify. Use this playlist to reach everything that's up so far. The rest will be added in the near future. Stay tuned!

item.title: Introducing The Faun
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Next up in the series of digital exclusive releases is The Faun. "Stand Straight EP" is his dubstep debut, featuring seductively dark but funky breaks and beats for maximum dance floor damage.
Buy it from Beatport, Digital-Tunes and Juno.
item.content:encoded:
Next up in the series of digital exclusive releases is The Faun. "Stand Straight EP" is his dubstep debut, featuring seductively dark but funky breaks and beats for maximum dance floor damage.

Buy it from Beatport, Digital-Tunes and Juno.

item.title: Il Dire Remixes EP
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Digital exclusive EP out now, featuring Twisted & Redemption's "Il Dire" remixed in many different flavours by Mac Koall, Cardopusher and 501.
Buy it from Beatport, Digital-Tunes and Juno.
item.content:encoded:
Digital exclusive EP out now, featuring Twisted & Redemption's "Il Dire" remixed in many different flavours by Mac Koall, Cardopusher and 501.

Buy it from Beatport, Digital-Tunes and Juno.

item.title: Redvolume CD out now!
item.dc:creator: Mikael Jergefelt
item.description:
Redvolume presents Catalogue Part One CD compilation! Collected on the disc, is the label's full output so far, together with some previously unreleased tunes from up and coming producers. This compilation might just be the most diverse collection of dubstep to date, capturing everything from industrial influences to ragga and vocals.
Opening track, "Mass Dampers" by Ekstrak, is upcoming on DJ/Rupture's mix-CD "Uproot". Nordic bass heroes L-Wiz and Tes La Rok show that it's not just a UK thing, side by side with Bristol producer, Forsaken, representing the UK scene outside of London. As for the vocals, Redvolume is proud to present Hit By A Rock's gorgeous remix of Mercury Prize nominee Susheela Raman's "Love Lies", hoping to take you on an inspiring journey into what we love and call dubstep.
View the tracklist and find out where to buy.
item.content:encoded:
Redvolume presents Catalogue Part One CD compilation! Collected on the disc, is the label's full output so far, together with some previously unreleased tunes from up and coming producers. This compilation might just be the most diverse collection of dubstep to date, capturing everything from industrial influences to ragga and vocals.

Opening track, "Mass Dampers" by Ekstrak, is upcoming on DJ/Rupture's mix-CD "Uproot". Nordic bass heroes L-Wiz and Tes La Rok show that it's not just a UK thing, side by side with Bristol producer, Forsaken, representing the UK scene outside of London. As for the vocals, Redvolume is proud to present Hit By A Rock's gorgeous remix of Mercury Prize nominee Susheela Raman's "Love Lies", hoping to take you on an inspiring journey into what we love and call dubstep.

View the tracklist and find out where to buy.

item.title: L-Wiz / Subeena / Faib vinyl out now!
item.dc:creator: Michael Johansson
item.description:
RVOL007: L-Wiz / Subeena / Faib (Innasekt Remix) out now!
View the tracklist and find out where to buy.
